text: This article presents the discography of Canadian country music artist Carroll Baker. Between 1970 and 1992, Baker released 14 studio albums and charted 53 singles on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart, including 14 number one hits. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
